extendedInfo.description: The wandering Panda from Pretty Pet Salon fame has turned to cute and entertaining magic shows to excite children and adults alike! Behold this magical Panda Bear, he's not just cute but enchanting too!Once a wandering samurai, Pandingo lived a troublesome life. He longed for peace and finally settled down and currently works at the Pretty Pet Salon. Little did everyone know that he has the knack and talent for magic. He's a pretty talented magician, he finds no problem in using limited resources. Choose 1 or 2 items that he will use in his magic show, pick different combinations to get different results! Play My Pet Pandingo and get a glimpse of Pandingo's wacky and playful side! Let the show begin!

reviews.title: I would give this zero stars if possible
reviews.comment: This sucks.every time I try to see a stupid \"magic trick\" it leaves the program.when I go back into the stupid pathetic pointless game, my points gone

reviews.title: Okay :)
reviews.comment: I find it quite useful. I have a nephew less than 5 years old. He was crying so i showed him this and he likes how he is able to choose whichever stuffs he likes for the magic show ^^ It\'s nice to see him smile :)
